TopicTitle: Precise control of one direction only

Articles.Content: Mechjeb has a wonderful module called Smart A.S.S, which gives you very precise controls of pitch, yaw, and roll. But unfortunately they all work together at the same time. I'm looking for a mod or a way to control only one at a time. For example I want to be able to control only the pitch, and let the yaw and roll do whatever. Is there a way to do this?
